verses.verse: And they took their journey <S%H5265><s%> from Elim <S%H362><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>, which is between Elim <S%H362><s%> and Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> after their departing out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>:

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4310><s%>, Would to God we had died <S%H4191><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, when we sat <S%H3427><s%> by the flesh <S%H1320><s%> pots <S%H5518><s%>, and when we did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7648><s%>; for you have brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> into this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, to kill <S%H4191><s%> this whole assembly <S%H6951><s%> with hunger <S%H7458><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Behold <S%H4305><s%>, I will rain bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for you <S%H5971><s%>; and the people shall go out <S%H3318><s%> and gather <S%H3950><s%> a certain rate <S%H1697><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%>, that I may prove <S%H5254><s%> them <S%H3212><s%>, whether they will walk in my law <S%H8451><s%>, or not.

And it shall come to pass <S%H8345><s%>, that on the sixth day <S%H3117><s%> they shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> they bring in <S%H935><s%>; and it shall be twice <S%H4932><s%> as much as they gather <S%H3950><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, At even <S%H6153><s%>, then you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has brought you out <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

And in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, then you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; for that he hears <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and what are we <S%H5168><s%>, that you murmur against us <S%H3885><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, This shall be <S%H3068><s%>, when the Lord shall give <S%H5414><s%> you in the evening <S%H6153><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7646><s%>; for that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> which you murmur <S%H3885><s%> against him <S%H5168><s%>: and what are we? Your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> are not against us <S%H3068><s%>, but against the Lord.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Come near <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for he has heard <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H175><s%>, as Aaron spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and <S%H3519><s%>, behold, the glory of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, At even <S%H996><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%>; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H6153><s%>, that at even the quails <S%H7958><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>: and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> lay <S%H7902><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>.

And when the dew <S%H2919><s%> that lay <S%H7902><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%>, behold <S%H6440><s%>, upon the face of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> there lay a small <S%H1851><s%> round thing <S%H2636><s%>, as small <S%H1851><s%> as the hoar frost <S%H3713><s%> on the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H559><s%>, they said one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, It is manna <S%H4478><s%>: for they knew <S%H3045><s%> not what it was <S%H4872><s%>. And Moses said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3899><s%>, This is the bread which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you to eat <S%H402><s%>.

This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%>, Gather <S%H3950><s%> of it every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%>, an omer <S%H6016><s%> for every man <S%H1538><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of your persons <S%H5315><s%>; take <S%H3947><s%> you every man <S%H376><s%> for them which are in his tents <S%H168><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3950><s%>, and gathered, some more <S%H7235><s%>, some less <S%H4591><s%>.

And when they did measure <S%H4058><s%> it with an omer <S%H6016><s%>, he that gathered much <S%H7235><s%> had nothing over <S%H5736><s%>, and he that gathered little <S%H4591><s%> had no lack <S%H2637><s%>; they gathered <S%H3950><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let no man <S%H376><s%> leave <S%H3498><s%> of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

Nevertheless they listened <S%H8085><s%> not unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>; but some <S%H582><s%> of them left <S%H3498><s%> of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and it bred <S%H7311><s%> worms <S%H8438><s%>, and stank <S%H887><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was angry with them <S%H7107><s%>.

And they gathered <S%H3950><s%> it every morning <S%H1242><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%>: and when the sun <S%H8121><s%> grew hot <S%H2552><s%>, it melted <S%H4549><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8345><s%>, that on the sixth day <S%H3117><s%> they gathered <S%H3950><s%> twice <S%H4932><s%> as much bread <S%H3899><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> omers <S%H6016><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H5387><s%>: and all the rulers of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, This is that which the Lord has said <S%H1696><s%>, To morrow <S%H4279><s%> is the rest <S%H7677><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: bake <S%H644><s%> that which you will bake <S%H644><s%> to day <S%H1310><s%>, and boil that you will boil <S%H1310><s%>; and that which <S%H3605><s%> remains over <S%H5736><s%> lay up <S%H3240><s%> for you to be kept <S%H4931><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.
And they laid it up <S%H3240><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>, as Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H6680><s%>: and it did not stink <S%H887><s%>, neither was there any worm in it <S%H7415><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Eat <S%H398><s%> that to day <S%H3117><s%>; for to day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: to day <S%H3117><s%> you shall not find <S%H4672><s%> it in the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall gather <S%H3950><s%> it <S%H7637><s%>; but on the seventh day <S%H3117><s%>, which is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, in it there shall be none.
And it came to pass <S%H3318><s%>, that there went out some of the people <S%H5971><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> for to gather <S%H3950><s%>, and they found none <S%H4672><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, How long refuse <S%H3985><s%> you to keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and my laws <S%H8451><s%>?

See <S%H7200><s%>, for that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, therefore he gives <S%H5414><s%> you on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of two days <S%H3117><s%>; stay <S%H3427><s%> you every man <S%H376><s%> in his place <S%H376><s%>, let no man go out <S%H3318><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
So the people <S%H5971><s%> rested <S%H7673><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> there Manna <S%H4478><s%>: and it was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, white <S%H3836><s%>; and the taste <S%H2940><s%> of it was like wafers <S%H6838><s%> made with honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, Fill <S%H4393><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> of it to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for your generations <S%H1755><s%>; that they may see <S%H7200><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> with which I have fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, when I brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H259><s%> pot <S%H6803><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of manna <S%H4478><s%> in it and lay it up <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for your generations <S%H1755><s%>.
As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so Aaron <S%H175><s%> laid it up <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Testimony <S%H5715><s%>, to be kept <S%H4931><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, until they came <S%H935><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> inhabited <S%H3427><s%>; they did eat <S%H398><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%>, until they came <S%H935><s%> unto the borders <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.
Now an omer <S%H6016><s%> is the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%>.
